nodes.text: Dalton Iselen was a male Human, who lived during the time of the Clone Wars.

Iselen was one of the managing partners of Naescorcom, a manufacturing company that was based on the planet Genarius. After the heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who operated in the Cularin system, uncovered a secret Believer lab beneath a Naescorcom facility on Ipsus, the crime lord Nirama introduced Iselen to them. He thanked them for their efforts and offered them a job developing a new security system for the facility.
